item.description:
Dear Meditators...
You may be interested in this class coming up, which includes yoga, meditation, sound healing...all by candlelight. See info below
Happy Holidays!

Oh and don't forget there is no medidation on Dec. 25 and Jan. 1.

 

Sacred Yoga by candlelight, with sound healing
4 Wednesday evenings, 7:00-8:15 Jan. 4-25 $48
limited to 10

Safe for all levels. Open the body with yoga postures, soothe your being with sacred music and live crystal singing bowls, deep rest with shivasana, meditation. Registration and full payment requested
by Jan. 1. Contact Judy to register: 781-639-1236. Bring yoga mat (let me know if you don't have one - I have 3), blanket and water. This class is meant for you to embody sacred energy and light. Expect ease for your body, spaceiousness for your mind, openness for your heart. Class may continue after the four sessions.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Sacred Yoga by Candlelight with Sound Healing
